name: Denki Kaminari (II)
text: You cannot discard momentum to pay the cost of keyword abilities.  Enhance [Once per turn]: Add the top card of your deck to your momentum.  Enhance [Your turn] Discard your entire momentum: If this is a Charge attack, your rival commits 1 foundation for each momentum discarded to pay the cost of this ability.

name: Indiscriminate Shock
text: Enhance: Your rival discards 1 random card and draws 1 card.  Enhance Discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, add the top 2 cards of your deck to your momentum.

name: Rockin' Attitude
text: Response Remove: After you block with a Charge or Stun attack, add it to your momentum.

name: Eijiro Kirishima (II)
text: Enhance [Twice per turn] Destroy 1 foundation: Build 1 card from your hand face down. Draw 1 card. Your attack gets +2 damage.  Response Commit: After your rival's attack is not blocked, it deals half damage rounded down during the Damage Step.

name: Hardened Crusher
text: Response: After your play this card, your rival flips 1 foundation.  Enhance Discard the top 2 cards of your deck: If this attack deals damage, build it face down during the End Phase.

name: Homage To My Hero
text: Response Commit: After you are dealt damage by an unblocked attack, draw 1 card.  Enhance: If you have built a foundation this Combat Phase, your Fury or Punch attack gets +1 damage.

name: Momo Yaoyorozu (II)
text: First Form: Build 1 asset or foundation with a keyword from your hand. Gain 1 health.  Response [Once per turn]: After you play a Weapon card, it gains 1 of the following keywords that it does not already have - Breaker: 1, Flash, Powerful: 3, or Stun: 2.

name: Cannon Blast
text: Enhance Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +1 speed and +2 damage.  Enhance Commit 2 foundations: This attack gets +2 speed and +4 damage.

name: Study Group Leader
text: Response Flip: After the 2nd or greater copy of an attack is played this turn, it loses 1 keyword ability of your choice.  Yaoyorozu Response [Once per turn]: After you commit this card to pay the cost of an ability, ready this foundation. Playable while committed.

name: Yuga Aoyama (II)
text: Enhance [Once per turn, your turn] Add 1 foundation from your card pool to momentum: Your [mid] attack gets +3 damage.  Enhance Lose 1 health: Your [mid] attack gets +1 speed.

name: Tummy Ache Laser
text: Enhance: Flip 1 committed foundation. If you did, ready it.  Enhance Lose1 health: This attack gains Powerful: 3.

name: Midnight's Assistance
text: Enhance Add this card to your card pool: Your [mid] attack gets +2 speed.  Response Flip: After this card is committed due to your rival effect, discard 1 rival momentum. Playable while committed.
